::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse smiles at Megaton, knowing that DrillBit would support her 
now. She waits for the Megatron-clone to respond to DrillBit.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "No. this guy isn't going to push my team around, in our own base.
> Get to the point, Megaton! If you want to continue to beat around 
the
> bush, then go take a swim in the lava! Now tell us what you came to
> tell."
> He calmed himself, and his tone with the last sentance.
> He would stand up for his troops. They were family to him. Megaton
> wasn't going to come into their home, and push them around.
